service_name: Architecture as a Service for Cloud Solutions
page_content:
Medley Business Solutions Ltd

Architecture as a Service for Cloud Solutions

We assess business and ICT needs to define appropriate and cost-effective cloud solutions. We provide this a managed service for architecture development, management and assurance during strategic planning and service delivery for portfolios, programmes or projects. It brings together different experts and specialists to support each stage of the requirement.

Features

  • Strategy, architecture and cost reduction review for transition to cloud
  • Strategic, outline and full business case support for cloud transition
  • Information standard assessment, definition and management, interface and API definition
  • Information architecture development and alignment with corporate information modelling
  • Proof of concept and pilot - scoping, operation and assessment
  • Business architecture, facilitated workshops, Use cases, cloud services options development
  • Cloud architecture design and assurance, and Architecture as a Service
  • Solution architecture for individual initiatives, enterprise architecture across the organisation
  • ERP, CRM, EDRM and CMS cloud architecture evaluation and selection
  • Technical architecture, security architecture, infrastructure, networking, communications solutions

Benefits

  • Cost-effective managed service with oversight and knowledge share across service
  • Well designed architecture based on effective analysis and evaluation
  • Business, technical, organisational and commercial aspects embedded
  • Best service design for organisation using most cost-effective Cloud approach
  • Minimised cost of transition to new solution and legacy rationalisation
  • Reduced operation and support costs, solution accommodates future enhancement
  • Access to independent Medley expertise and quality assurance across lifecycle
  • Solutions cover cloud services, COTS packages, microservices, ERP, CRM components
  • Police, criminal justice, central government, local authority and health experience
  • Procurement compliance and support, market evaluation, horizon scanning

Pricing

£647 to £1087 per person per day

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Hour
